description: This is a market on predicting the winner of the NBA Most Valuable Player award for the 2024-25 NBA season.

markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Luka Doncic is awarded the 2025 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP) Award. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If listed player is not announced as a finalist for the 2025 NBA MVP award, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
markets.question: Will Luka Doncic win the 2024-25 NBA MVP?
